definition: background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: The population of Normandy, which saw most of the fighting, halved.
sentences.chinese: 經歷了大部分戰鬥的諾曼底人，半數死亡。

sentences.english: Ice situation not expected to change in area around Normandy.
sentences.chinese: 冰況在靠近諾曼底處將不會改變。

sentences.english: The second chapter analyzes the history of England from Normandy Conquest to Glory Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 第二章分析從諾曼底征服到光榮革命時期的英國。

sentences.english: In Normandy, the Allies secured absolute command of both the air and sea.
sentences.chinese: 在諾曼底，盟軍已經牢牢地掌握了制海權和制空權。

sentences.english: D-Day was the result of broad international accord.
sentences.chinese: 諾曼底登陸是廣泛國際合作的結果。

sentences.english: Sarkozy is set to visit Mont Saint Michel in Normandy, France that day.
sentences.chinese: 薩科齊將訪問聖米歇爾山在諾曼底，法國那一天。

sentences.english: A second new plant in Normandy appears to be experiencing similar problems.
sentences.chinese: 諾曼底的另一個新核電站似乎也面臨同樣的問題。

sentences.english: The Vikings invaded present-day Normandy in the 9th century.
sentences.chinese: 斯堪的納維亞人在第9世紀侵略了當代的諾曼底。

sentences.english: Normandy was the classic example of modern combined arms, air-land, coalition warfare.
sentences.chinese: 諾曼底登陸是一次經典的現代空軍和陸軍的聯合作戰。

sentences.english: The landing in Normandy is merely a diversionary maneuver.
sentences.chinese: 諾曼底登陸只是聲東擊西的陽動。

sentences.english: According to the textbook of history, the Normans conquered England in1066.
sentences.chinese: 據歷史書記載諾曼底人於一零六六年佔領了英格蘭。

sentences.english: Oneway Normandyis comparable to go is the fact that the deception is involved.
sentences.chinese: 與圍棋相比，諾曼底實際上是運用了詭詐之術。

sentences.english: Allied land forces that saw combat in Normandy on D-Day itself came from Canada, the United Kingdom and the United States of America.
sentences.chinese: 參與諾曼底登陸的盟軍來自加拿大，英國和美國。

sentences.english: Visit medieval castles in Normandy and the Loire Valley.
sentences.chinese: 在諾曼底參觀中世紀城堡和盧瓦爾河谷。

sentences.english: The Normans ruled England by right of conquest.
sentences.chinese: 諾曼底人於一零六六年佔領英格蘭。

sentences.english: World War II veterans return to Normandy 65 years after D-Day.
sentences.chinese: 諾曼底登陸65年後，二戰退伍軍人回到諾曼底。
